item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 24, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A QR code that sends you to a different destination – lenticular and adversarial (207 points | 35 comments)
2. Thank HN: My bootstrapped startup got acquired today (1340 points | 230 comments)

27. TMSU: Command-line tool for applying tags and viewing virtual tagged filesystem (84 points | 36 comments)

29. How shut-down Bay Area tech companies ditch their fancy gear (201 points | 174 comments)
